metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0570 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the SET_WPS_IE IOCTL implementation inwlan_hdd_hostapd.c in the WLAN (aka Wi-Fi) driver for the Linux kernel 3.xand 4.x, as used in Qualcomm Innovation Center (QuIC) Android contributionsfor MSM devices and other products, allows attackers to gain privileges viaa crafted application that uses a long WPS IE element.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
